description: Property Management Database - Contains information about property owners, properties, units, and leases

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the owner (Primary Key)

columns.name: owner_name
columns.description: Name of the owner or holding company (e.g., LLC1, LLC2)

columns.name: contact_email
columns.description: Email address of the owner

columns.name: contact_phone
columns.description: Phone number of the owner

tables.name: Properties
tables.description: Real estate properties managed by the company

columns.name: property_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the property (Primary Key)

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Owners table

columns.name: address
columns.description: Full street address of the property

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the property is located

columns.name: state
columns.description: State abbreviation (e.g., PA, AZ, CA)

columns.name: zip_code
columns.description: ZIP or postal code

columns.name: property_type
columns.description: Type of property (Single Family, Multi-Family, Commercial)

columns.name: purchase_date
columns.description: Date when the property was purchased (ISO format)

columns.name: purchase_price
columns.description: Original purchase price in USD

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Whether the property is actively managed (1=active, 0=inactive)

columns.name: unit_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the unit (Primary Key)

columns.name: property_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Properties table

columns.name: unit_number
columns.description: Unit number or identifier (e.g., Unit A, Unit 101)

columns.name: bedrooms
columns.description: Number of bedrooms

columns.name: bathrooms
columns.description: Number of bathrooms (can be fractional like 1.5)

columns.name: square_feet
columns.description: Total square footage of the unit

columns.name: monthly_rent
columns.description: Current monthly rent amount in USD

columns.name: lease_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the lease (Primary Key)

columns.name: unit_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Units table

columns.name: tenant_name
columns.description: Name of the tenant

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Lease start date (ISO format)

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: Lease end date (ISO format)

columns.name: monthly_rent
columns.description: Monthly rent amount for this lease in USD

columns.name: security_deposit
columns.description: Security deposit amount in USD

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Whether the lease is currently active (1=active, 0=expired)

relationships.description: One owner can have many properties
One property can have many units
One unit can have multiple leases (over time)

business_rules: All monetary values are in USD
Dates are stored in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)
is_active flag indicates current operational status
For profitability calculations, consider rent income vs purchase price and operating costs
